data.title: PJ collaborations / guest appearances
data.meta_description: I've been trying to track down all of the collaborations and guest appearances that the guys have done with other artists over the years.
data.text:
I've been trying to track down all of the collaborations and guest appearances that the guys have done with other artists over the years. So far I've found over 130 listed (although I don't have all them yet) but I'm sure there must be more that I've missed.

I haven't included the side projects, PJ Christmas singles that have guests (Robert Plant, Bono etc) or other live appearances. These are only songs that have been officially released at some point.

Can anybody think of any that I've missed?

Lazy Susan with Mike - Bored

Pearl Jam with Victoria Williams - Crazy Mary

Ed, Mike and GE Smith - Masters Of War (live)

Also, I know Stone, Mike and Jeff have played on like Steve Turner, Minus 5 and Tribe After Tribe records respectively but I haven't been able to find out which specific tracks. If anybody could help me out with this info that'd be great. I refuse to include the Chad Kroeger Spiderman song that Matt played on!
